channel.title: Talks & Workshops on Crystal Lewis
channel.description: Recent content in Talks & Workshops on Crystal Lewis

item.title: R for the Rest of Us Podcast Guest
item.description: In this podcast episode, David and I discuss topics such as the importance of data management planning, what a data validation and data cleaning process looks like, as well as my thoughts on writing my book using Bookdown in R.

item.title: Data Management in Large-Scale Education Research
item.description: In this webinar I discuss why I wrote the open access book, Data Management in Large-Scale Education Research, as well as share a few key takeaways from the book.

item.title: Starting Your Freelance Career
item.description: Materials from a presentation given to a group of students and faculty in the University of Nebraska, Lincoln QQPM Seminar. In this presentation I provided background into how I got into freelance consulting, as well as tips for anyone looking to get into this type of work.

item.title: Data Cleaning for Data Sharing Using R
item.description: Materials from a half-day professional development workshop given at the 2024 NCME Annual Meeting. This workshop provided a foundational understanding of how to organize data for the purpose of data sharing.

item.title: Ten Common Data Management Mistakes
item.description: These are materials for a presentation given to the Alaska Region of Fish and Wildlife Service for Data Week.

item.title: Cleaning Medical Data in R
item.description: Materials from a workshop given at the R/Medicine 2023 Conference. My co-presenters included Shannon Pileggi and Peter Higgins.

item.title: Essential Data Management Best Practices and Tools for NIH Compliance
item.description: This webinar features a panel discussion on how research teams can implement best-practice data management, with particular emphasis on the NIHâ€™s Data Management and Sharing Policy requirements.

item.title: Data Management Workflows for Education Research Studies
item.description: These are slides from a guest lecture presentation for a graduate research methods class at the UHCL. The talk was on how to create data management workflows for education research studies.

item.title: Ten Common Data Management Mistakes
item.description: These are materials for a presentation given to the Society for the Study of School Psychology Early Career Forum. This same talk was also given to the University of Washington, SMART Center on 2022-11-09.

item.title: A Comparison of Packages to Generate Codebooks in R
item.description: These are materials for a 5 minute lightning talk I gave to R-Ladies NYC. The topic was comparing 4 R packages that can be used to create codebooks to document your data. *Note: On 2022-12-12 I made a small update to the slides. I discovered that the codebookr::codebook() function did not create 2 of the summary statistics I originally thought it did. So the slides now reflect this finding.

item.title: Data Management in Large-Scale Ed Research
item.description: These slides are from a series of talks on best practices in documentation, creating a style guide and collecting data.
